update.name: CVE-2023-46604-ActiveMQ-RCE-pseudoshell
update.description: This script leverages CVE-2023046604 (Apache ActiveMQ) to generate a pseudo shell. The vulnerability allows for remote code execution due to unsafe deserialization within the OpenWire protocol.
